import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; // import { Task } from './task'; export interface Task { id: number; title: string; description: string; created_at: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list', templateUrl: './task-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list.component.css'] }) export class TaskListComponent { protected tasks!: Task[]; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } private apiUrl = 'http://localhost:8000/api/tasks/'; ngOnInit() { this.getTasks().subscribe((tasks: Task[]) => { this.tasks = tasks; }); } getTasks(): Observable { return this.http.get(this.apiUrl); } newTask: Task = { id: 1, title: '', description: '', created_at: '' }; createTask() { this.http.post(this.apiUrl, this.newTask) .subscribe(() => { // code to refresh the task list goes here }); } }
